alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN RIPLEY, SOUTHWESTERN DEARBORN AND NORTHWESTERN SWITZERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Versailles, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Versailles, Dillsboro, Pleasant, Fairview, Farmers Retreat, Bear Branch, Friendship, Cross Plains, Pate, Benham, Olean and Avonburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
